events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin processing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and the role applied for.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening was completed successfully, and you meet the basic qualifications for the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening questions, it confirms your strong interest in the engineering position.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 10:00 AM with one of our senior software engineers.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving ability.
An HR interview is scheduled for May 15th to discuss your cultural fit and benefits package.
Your HR interview went well, with positive feedback regarding your communication skills and team compatibility.
We have proposed a job offer for the Software Engineer position and sent it to you for your consideration.
You have provided positive feedback on the job offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining the team.
You accepted the job offer officially, and we are excited to onboard you into our engineering department.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to development tools, orientation sessions, and team introductions.
The hiring process for your Software Engineer position is now complete. Welcome to the team and we look forward to your contributions.
